biography.summary: Mark Kelly is a Democratic U.S. Senator from Arizona who has served since January 3, 2023, and previously served as a NASA astronaut and Navy pilot.
biography.early_life: Born February 21, 1964. Raised in the United States, with a career in the military and aerospace.
biography.education: B.S. in electrical engineering from the U.S. Naval Academy; M.S. in Space Systems Operations from the Naval Postgraduate School.
biography.career: Former U.S. Navy pilot and NASA astronaut, later elected to the U.S. Senate.

contact.office_address: 516 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510
